thread.title: NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun

title: NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun
text:
NYPD fatally shoot man with a pipe after reports of a gun 3:34am EDT - 01:30 
A police official says New York police officers on Wednesday shot to death a black man who pointed a metal pipe at them, after responding to emergency callers who said the main was aiming a firearm at pedestrians.   
A police official says New York police officers on Wednesday shot to death a black man who pointed a metal pipe at them, after responding to emergency callers who said the main was aiming a firearm at pedestrians.  //reut.rs/2JmknDh
